column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I realize that this place is a bit of a scene
column2: and while I'd normally opine more fully on the decor and service
column3: I'm going to focus on food in this review which is the basis for the 4 stars I'm giving. Suffice it to say the service was efficient and the atmosphere lively
column4: even on a Sunday evening. Here's what we tried:
